GatheringDef.label: feast
GatheringDef.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} suggests throwing a feast after the last stockpile check to boost morale. Be warned - Feasts can last up to 48h. Colonists will binge on food and drugs until it is over. Simply draft your colonists to stop them taking part in the feast.
GatheringDef.calledOffMessage: The feast has been called off.
